instruction: Create an outline for a news report about climate change.
output:
I. Introduction 
A. Definition of climate change 
B. Overview of the effects of climate change 

II. Causes of Climate Change 
A. Carbon dioxide emissions from burning fossil fuels 
B. Deforestation 
C. Energy and industrial growth

III. Effects of Climate Change 
A. Increase in global temperatures 
B. Rising sea levels 
C. More frequent and severe storms and floods 

IV. Solutions to Climate Change 
A. Reduced emissions of carbon dioxide and other gases 
B. Reforestation 
C. Swapping fossil fuels for renewable energy sources 

V. Conclusion 
A. Summary 
B. Urgent need for action
